disabled.description: Whether to disable all check boxes

max.description: The maximum number of options is unlimited, with '0' being unlimited
max.description_zh: 最大可选数，`0` 为无限制

direction.description_zh: 排列方向，可选值为 horizontal

icon-size.description: The size of the icon for all checkboxes, with the default unit being px
icon-size.description_zh: 所有复选框的图标大小，默认单位为 px

checked-color.description: The selected status color for all checkboxes
checked-color.description_zh: 所有复选框的选中状态颜色

methods.name: toggleAll
methods.description: Toggle all checkboxes, pass 'true' to check, 'false' to uncheck, and no parameter to negate
methods.description_zh: 切换所有复选框，传 `true` 为选中，`false` 为取消选中，不传参为取反

events.name: change
events.description: An event that is triggered when a binding value changes
events.description_zh: 当绑定值变化时触发的事件
